repositoryCreatedBy.title: Created by user identifier
repositoryCreatedBy.description: User ID of who created the record.

repositoryLastModifiedBy.title: Modified by user identifier
repositoryLastModifiedBy.description: User ID of who last modified the record. At creation time, `modifiedByUser` is set as `createdByUser`.

createdByBatchID.title: Created by batch identifier
createdByBatchID.description: The dataset files in Catalog which has been originating the creation of the record.

modifiedByBatchID.title: Modified by batch identifier
modifiedByBatchID.description: The last dataset files in Catalog which has modified the record. At creation time, `modifiedByBatchID` is set as `createdByBatchID`.

createDate.description: The server date and time when the resource was created in the repository, such as when an asset file is first uploaded or a directory is created by the server as the parent of a new asset. The date time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

modifyDate.description: The server date and time when the resource was last modified in the repository, such as when a new version of an asset is uploaded or a directory's child resource is added or removed. The date time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

val.title: Choice Value
val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

preferred.title: Preferred Channel
preferred.description: User's preferred channel for receiving communications

time.title: Preference timestamp
time.description: Date and time this specific preference was collected. This value should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: A set of notifications, newsletters, etc. to which the user subscribes

mapObj.title: Subscription
mapObj.description: The name or identifier of the specific subscription

subscribers.title: Subscribers
subscribers.description: The set of identifiers (email addresses, phone numbers, etc.) for this user who have subscribed

mapObj.title: Subscriber
mapObj.description: The specific identifier (email addresses, phone numbers, etc.) for this subscriber

time.description: Date and time this specific preference was collected. This value should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

loyalty.description: Captures details related to the customer's loyalty rewards.

joinDate.title: Program Join Date
joinDate.description: Date which the visitor registered for the loyalty program.

loyaltyID.title: Program ID
loyaltyID.description: The loyalty program ID(s) associated with a specific user, if they are enrolled in the client's loyalty program.

points.title: Program Points Balance
points.description: Current balance of the loyalty points/awards in a visitor's loyalty account.

pointsRedeemed.title: Points Redeemed
pointsRedeemed.description: Amount of points applied toward a purchase or otherwise redeemed.

program.title: Program Name
program.description: This should define the loyalty progam in which a visitor is enrolled.

upgradeDate.title: Program Name
upgradeDate.description: Date which the customer was upgraded to the next tier level.

status.title: Status
status.description: Captures the visitor's loyalty progam status, such as active, disabled, or suspended.

tier.title: Tier
tier.description: Captures the loyalty progam tier in which a visitor is enrolled.

person.title: Person
person.description: An individual actor, contact, or owner.

seat.title: Seat
seat.description: Captures the user's preferred seat type for flights.

seatSection.title: Seat Section
seatSection.description: Captures the user's preferred seat sectionfor flights.

meal.title: Meal
meal.description: Tracks the user's meal preference, if provided.

preferredDepartureAirportCode.title: Preferred Departure Airport Code
preferredDepartureAirportCode.description: Records the user's preferred home/departure airport code.

ticketDelivery.title: Ticket Delivery
ticketDelivery.description: Defines the user's preferred ticket delivery method.

medicalAlerts.title: Medical Alerts
medicalAlerts.description: Captures any medical alerts for the user.

roomType.title: Room Type
roomType.description: Tracks the user's preferred room type.

smokingRoom.title: Smoking Room
smokingRoom.description: Flags if the user prefers a smoking room.

foamPillows.title: Foam Pillows
foamPillows.description: Captures if the user prefers foam pillows.

rollAwayBed.title: Roll Away Bed
rollAwayBed.description: Captures if the user requires a rollaway bed.

crib.title: Crib
crib.description: Captures if the user requires a crib.

earlyCheckIn.title: Early Check-In
earlyCheckIn.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with early check-in available.

gym.title: Gym
gym.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with a gym/fitness room.

pool.title: Pool
pool.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with a swimming pool.

hasRestaurant.title: Has Restaurant
hasRestaurant.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with a restaurant.

roomService.title: Room Service
roomService.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with room service available.

wheelchairAccessible.title: Wheelchair Accessible
wheelchairAccessible.description: Tracks if the user requres a wheelchair accessible room.

visuallyImpairedAccessible.title: Visually Impaired Accessible
visuallyImpairedAccessible.description: Tracks if the user requres a visually impaired accessible room.

vehicleType.title: Vehicle Type
vehicleType.description: Records the user's vehicle type preference.

smokingVehicle.title: Smoking Vehicle
smokingVehicle.description: Flags if the user prefers a smoking vehicle.

manualTransmission.title: Manual Transmission
manualTransmission.description: Records if a user prefers a manual transmission instead of an automatic transmission.

userAccount.description: Loyalty details, preferences, login processes, and other account preferences.

contactDetails.title: Contact Details
contactDetails.description: Extension of the Personal Profile data type.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: Date when the account was opened.

status.title: Status
status.description: This should describe the current status of the account

accountType.title: Account Type
accountType.description: Captures the user account type, if applicable.

productPreferences.title: Product Preferences
productPreferences.description: Product, shopping, or experience preferences such as gender, color pref, seat/aisle, king/double bed, etc.

alertStatus.title: Alert Status
alertStatus.description: Captures whether or not alerts have been enabled for the account.

autopayStatus.title: Autopay Status
autopayStatus.description: Captures whether or not the account has been enrolled in autopay.
